name: had increased
description:
It's a big leap forward from Outhouse's past games with World of Goo and Tawes.
It's called Kicking Champions, and it's entirely technical. There's a character fighting pitbulls and opposing champions fighters, along with guards and more. But as Co-Founder of Outhouse Media, Brian 'Outhouse' Owens, says, it's much more than a second-rate sports game. The game is entirely violent. It's post-apocalyptic, and it even has a soundtrack that's utterly ferocious when blasting through your enemies' defenses. It'll be released in the but August for the PSP, PS Vita, Playstation 3 and PC.
